channel.title: Equilibrium 718 ~ Just Released!
channel.description:
[center]Equilibrium 718[/center]
[center]Before I get into the advertising, I'd like to start with a little intro here.. I used to be a player of rsps's. Ive played my fair share of them and the one thing Ive seen more than anything are servers with 'donor only' options. I personally believe that all players no matter what rank or title are in place should be treated just as equal as the rest. That is what inspired me to make my own server, so here we are.[/center]
Now for the server features:
[ul][li]All Skills working[/li] [li]Eco/PvP Server[/li] [li]Zombies Minigame[/li] [li]Customer Dungeoneering[/li] [li]753 Items and Interfaces[/li] [li]Flawless Switching[/li] [li]Double Xp Weekends[/li] [li]Difficulty Selection[/li] [li]Prestige System[/li] [li]Skilling Rewards[/li] [li]PvP system[/li] [li]Loyalty Point System[/li] [li]Squeal of Fortune[/li] [li]Fight Caves[/li] [li]Fight Kiln[/li] [li]Nex[/li] [li]Queen/King Black Dragon[/li] [li]Kalphite Queen[/li] [li]Crucible[/li] [li]...And so much more![/li][/ul]
Forum Link: [url=http://equilibriumrs.freesmfhosting.com/index.php?action=forum]http://equilibriumrs.freesmfhosting.com/index.php?action=forum[/url] Client DL: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/uu1gboasqfga54a]http://www.mediafire.com/download/uu1gboasqfga54a[/url] Come check it out today!

[center]Equilibrium 718[/center]

Ive played my fair share of them and the one thing Ive seen more than anything are servers with ‘donor only’ options.
